actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To eliminate the recent 25 percent pay increase for Members of Congress until such time as a constitutional amendment is proposed to the States which would, if ratified, require a balanced Federal budget.

summary.text: Eliminates a mandated 25 percent salary increase for Members of Congress until a Constitutional amendment has been proposed to the States requiring a balanced Federal budget.

titles.title: To eliminate the recent 25 percent pay increase for Members of Congress until such time as a constitutional amendment is proposed to the States which would, if ratified, require a balanced Federal budget.
